question_text: Describe an innovative solution you implemented.
How do you approach brainstorming sessions?
Share an example of creative problem-solving.
How do you overcome creative blocks?
Describe your process for generating new ideas.
How do you balance creativity with practicality?
Share an experience of implementing unconventional solutions.
How do you foster creativity in teams?
Describe a time creativity helped overcome resource limitations.
How do you measure creative success?
Share an example of adapting creative ideas from other fields.
How do you handle resistance to new ideas?
Describe your approach to prototyping/iterating ideas.
How do you maintain creativity under pressure?
Share an experience of failed creative attempt and lessons learned.
